references.paper_title: Deep Neural Networks and Tabular Data: A Survey
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning methods for tabular data, which is the focus of the current research.

references.paper_title: XGBoost: A Scalable Tree Boosting System
references.reason: XGBoost is a highly influential gradient boosting algorithm frequently used as a benchmark in machine learning research, particularly for tabular data.

references.paper_title: Additive logistic regression: a statistical view of boosting
references.reason: This foundational paper provides a statistical perspective on boosting algorithms, which underpins many modern boosting methods.

references.paper_title: Conditional Wasserstein GAN-based Oversampling of Tabular Data for Imbalanced Learning
references.reason: This work addresses the problem of imbalanced data, a frequent issue in tabular datasets, and proposes a generative model specifically designed for oversampling this type of data.
This paper introduces density estimation trees (DET), a foundational model for generative modeling of tabular data that the current work extends.
